conversations.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

<|Function_Thought|>
The cart contains three items: 
1. TechBrand Wireless Mouse (product_id: P001)
2. Backpack (product_id: P017)
3. Electric Toothbrush (product_id: P011)

Since the user wants to keep only the Electric Toothbrush, I need to remove the other two items from the cart before proceeding with the checkout.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P001")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P001 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The TechBrand Wireless Mouse has been successfully removed from the cart. I now need to remove the Backpack, which has product_id P017, before proceeding to checkout the Electric Toothbrush.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P017")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P017 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
Both the TechBrand Wireless Mouse and Backpack have been removed from the cart. The only item left is the Electric Toothbrush. Now, I can proceed to place the order for the Electric Toothbrush.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P011"])]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

To proceed with the checkout, you need to verify your account. A verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your email. Please provide the OTP so that I can complete the checkout process for you.
